main.we_are_boutique: We are a boutique headhunter specialized in IT

about.title: About Us
about.we_are_a_headhunting: We are a headhunting company, specialized in IT and also Jobs in the field of Marketing and Sales
about.we_does_now: Who doesn't know it or hasn't experienced it at least once in their professional career? And to those who don't know it - lucky you! It's Sunday afternoon and the weekly carousel of thoughts about the approaching Monday begins. Not in the mood for Mondays? Then it's time to change something.
about.we_have_made: We have made it our mission to find a job for you that will change your Monday. That will make it an enjoyable day of the week. And even if it still doesn't become your favourite day, it can be better, right?
about.in_order_to_really: In order to really be absorbed in a job and a role, the task is of course important first and foremost. However, everything else around it is at least as important and that is different for everyone. Because we are all different and value different things
about.thats_why_we_dont: That's why we don't just ask our clients about their tech stack, but also
about.in_this_way: In this way, our candidates learn much more about the position to be filled and do not experience any unpleasant surprises on site. Neither our candidates nor our clients waste valuable time in interviews in which it turns out that a very important point for one party is not given at all. If this had been clear in advance, the interview would not have taken place in the first place. Every person ticks differently. And in the same way, different points are important for each person
about.it_is_our_job: It is our job to recognise this. Our job is to look as deeply as possible into the company and also the role in advance in order to present it as transparently as possible to the candidates. In return, of course, we also want to learn something about candidates before we make contact with our clients. Our clients know us and trust our years of experience with IT experts.
about.of_course_even: Of course, even we cannot guarantee 100% that it will always be a perfect fit in the end. But we can do a lot to ensure that both sides only find out about each other if we ourselves believe that it is a good fit

list.2: Do the people make a happy impression?
list.3: Do they talk to each other a lot?
list.4: What is the mindset of the owners?
list.6: How are the working hours regulated?
list.7: Is there flexibility, home office and trust?

exp.title: What are you waiting for?
exp.text: How often do you ask yourself what is keeping you in your current job? Too often we expect something to change, but every day we do the same thing as before. But one thing is clear: nothing will change if you don't take the first step.

list.1: We are experts with an experience of 15 years in the headhunting industry
list.2: We are experts to fill IT/Tech roles
list.3: We understand that not only skills are important to decide for a new employee. But also the personality is key. So we take our time to find out what is important to the client if he hires new team members and do deep briefings with the candidates.

contact.title: You or your team have a tricky position to fill?
contact.text: Finding the right talent in the market has become an almost insurmountable task, especially in the field of tech and digitalisation.
contact.description: We are specialists in exactly this area, with over a decade of experience
contact.offer: Contact us and we will make you an individual offer

net.title: Network
net.text: In this section I want to show some of my partners I work with and recommend

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.text: Don't see a job that suits you? Send us your CV and we will contact you to discuss your interests.
jobs.description: We help our clients find the right candidates for their vacancies quickly and in a solution-oriented manner. In doing so, we not only change our candidates' Mondays, but also your team's Mondays. Tasks are completed faster, deadlines are met, growth is secured
